Original:
初訪🍽2023.02

原址位於延吉街，現今遷移至松江南京站附近

5號抱歉👋沒有特殊的記憶點

✔️低消$500✔️10%服務費

No. 1 is cool, the smoke flavor of bubbles is cool, and it tastes a bit of the taste of the guava. If you mind, you will not push this.
Sorry No. 5 👋 There is no special memory point
